scripts.clean:cjs: lerna exec rimraf cjs && tsc --build packages/tsconfig.cjs.json --clean
scripts.clean:esm: lerna exec rimraf esm && tsc --build packages/tsconfig.json --clean
scripts.clean: npm run clean:cjs && npm run clean:esm && lerna exec rimraf node_modules
scripts.update: npm run update:package && npm run update:tsconfig && lerna bootstrap --hoist && npm run update:code-workspace && npm run update:vscode-settings
scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run update && npm run build
scripts.watch: npm run build:cjs -- --incremental --watch & npm run build:esm -- --incremental --watch
scripts.test:ci: lerna bootstrap --hoist && npm run build && npm run test
